name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Marvin SMITH, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Marvin SMITH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert Davis Gleason, Johnstown, for appellant.
D. Gerard Long, Dist. Atty., Ebensburg, Ralph F. Kraft, Johnstown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 435
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Marvin SMITH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 19, 1978.
Decided Oct. 16, 1978.
Reargument Denied Nov. 8, 1978.
Robert Davis Gleason, Johnstown, for appellant.
D. Gerard Long, Dist. Atty., Ebensburg, Ralph F. Kraft, Johnstown, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
